titleStmt.title: A congratulatory poem on the right honourable Sr. Orlando Bridgman. Lord Keeper of the great seal of England

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed for William Cadman at the Popes-head in the lower walk in the New-Exchange near Durham-gate in the Strand,

notesStmt.note: At foot: Licensed according to order.
Place and date of publication from Wing.
Verse - "To you, as fast as verses feet can move".
British library copy imperfect: stained with loss of text.
Reproduction of the original in: British Library; Folger Shakespeare Library.
